sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UpdateTableChoiceList</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utility class to return a list of update_synch enabled
			tablenames</description>
        <name>UpdateTableChoiceList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");
gs.include("TableChoiceList");

var UpdateTableChoiceList = Class.create();
UpdateTableChoiceList.prototype = Object.extendsObject(TableChoiceList, {
    initialize : function() {
		
    },

    generate : function() {
      var tl = new GlideUpdateTableChoiceList();
      tl.setAll(false);
      tl.setCanRead(false);
	  tl.setShowTableNames(true);
      tl.generateChoices();
      this._toXML(tl);
    }
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2012-08-09 21:16:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>89b7d230bf332000421cdc2ecf073975</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UpdateTableChoiceList</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Editor for lists and related lists" source="com.glide.ui_list_edit">19f04d8b6d2620100acb70b3534330bc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_89b7d230bf332000421cdc2ecf073975</sys_update_name>

</record_update>
